content: उत्कंठते <ab>Den.</ab> <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be anxious. pine or be sorry for; <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 54.</ls> {@--2@} To yearn, be eagerly desirous of (with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>dat.</ab>); स्वर्गाय नोत्कंठते <ls>V. 3. 4</ls>; <ls>Mv. 6</ls>; उत्कठते च युष्मत्सन्निकर्षस्य <ls>U. 6</ls>, <ls n="U.">6. 21</ls>; <ls>Māl. 4</ls>; <ls>Bk. 5. 72.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (उत्कठयति) To create anxiety or longing, inspire with tender emotions; <ls>Bh. 1. 35</ls>; <ls>Ghaṭ. 5.</ls>
